projects.project_name: Earth dam and Concret spilway construction project.

ProjectSummary.Location: [ 130703 ] Preah Vihear \ Tbaeng Mean Chey \ Chhean Mukh
ProjectSummary.Name: Earth dam and Concret spilway construction project.
ProjectSummary.Objective: People have dam that has water for use, animals, agricultural plantations and others, causing their lives prosperity.

Land_Safeguard.Impact: This project did not require land acquisition report.Public
Land_Safeguard.Reason: The project implementation site is on the existing dam where need upgrading and no impact on any private own land.

Highland_Safeguard.Impact: This project did not require highland people report.
Highland_Safeguard.Reason: The project implementation site has no highland people resided.
